Posted By: Dave
Up for sale is a very nice t206 Ty Cobb portrait. Looking for $950 including shipping and insurance. Will take paypal or money order. Back scans (Sweet Cap 350) available on request but it's clean. Pretty nice for the grade if you ask me. The white line above his shoulder is not on the card...
